name: Falling From Grace
description:
"il sayd abo Aaly" an outstandingly unlucky egyptian who was chosen to represent the national efforts of flying to the moon, only to find that his rocket got sabotaged and is now falling from the sky, trying his very best to look for his parachute before he meets his demise.

That was our submission for GGJ 2021.

Game Design/Art:
Mekha

Programming:

Yousef "Gurin" Metwally

Music:
Ahmed "Nexusrex"
